![SPR Phase](/Scenarios/STTJ_RW_3/plots/SPR4_phase.png)

St. Thomas and St. John Yellowtail Snapper Review Workshop Model STTJ_RW_3. (a) Time series of SPR. Horizontal reference line is at SPR target: 0.4, (b) time series of 1-SPR. Horizontal reference lines 1 and at 1 - SPR target: 1 - 0.4 = 0.6; (c) the relative spawning stock biomass (total biomass / virgin spawning stock biomass) with ~95% asymptotic intervals. Horizontal reference lines at 1 and SPR target: 0.4; and (d) phase plot of biomass ratio vs. SPR ratio where warmer colors (red) represent early years and colder colors (blue) represent recent years. Lines through the final point show 95% intervals based on the asymptotic uncertainty for each dimension. The shaded ellipse is a 95% region which accounts for the estimated correlation between the two quantities: -0.126.
:::
